name: Stone
description: Used as a building or crafting material. Can be obtained by mining stone.

name: Wood
description: Used as a building or crafting material. Mainly obtained by lumbering trees.

name: Metal Ore
description: Can be smelted into ingots in a furnace. Found in caves. Some Pals can detect ores.

name: Palgeum Fragment
description: A crystallized object containing the energy of the World Tree. Used to craft special items or buildings.

name: Gunpowder
description: Gunpowder used for firing bullets. Required for making ammunition.
